ygData.subject: RE: Signing up PacNet
ygData.msgSnippet: I m also thinking of getting a unlimited usage acct, and I know cyberway got this $48 unlimited usage plan.  Can anyone advise me if there is any additional
ygData.messageBody:
I'm also thinking of getting a unlimited usage acct, and I know cyberway
got this $48 unlimited usage plan. Can anyone advise me if there is any
additional condition for this plan (say must subscibr for at least 6 mth
etc)?.

How abt PI and Singnet? Which one shld I go for? Any initial subscription
fee or attached condition?

Now I feel very boring at lvl 35, dunno what to hunt. These few days I'm
wandering in lower guk, najena, paw, BB trying to see if there is any named
mob that drop some goodies but no luck. Maybe I shld spend my time camping
for jboot liao, while waiting for other kakis (esp Fes and Zan) to lvl up
so we can grp and go for more dangerous place.

Ziltus

On Thursday, 16 September, 1999 12:03 AM, Diablo
[SMTP:diablo99@...] wrote:
> From: "Diablo" <diablo99@...>
>
> Maybe I wasn't clear enough... well just trying to say that casters
should
> be using 2 1h stuff instead of occupying 2 hands for something heavy and
> lousier than 2 1h stuff. A good combo for a mid lvl caster is a tomb of
> silver runes + glowing stein.
>
> At higher levels, in my opinion, a druid should use Paw of Opalla (sp?)
and
> Testament of Vanear. This should give a nice combo of +19 wis (?) and +10
> mana.
>
>
http://www.vestris.com/db-cgi/vac/agnes?GraffquestAgnes+GraffquestAgnesH
TMLA
> rticle+181.2 is the link for a more complete spoiler for the ice comet
> quest. Hope it helps.
>
> PS. Singnet is finally back with no more problems connecting to EQ. I
didn't
> get disconnected for a whole duration of 7 hours and uploading ping is
down
> to 120-240.
>
> Mazy
> Level 48 Wizard
> Prexus
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
> To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, September 15, 1999 6:29 PM
> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Signing up PacNet
>
>
> > From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
> >
> > SOO is only a good mid lvl items. At higer lvl my druid would be likely
> > using the Ice Cold Mace (whatever) plus the Charred Guardian. Or maybe
> > the paws??
> >
> > Diablo wrote:
> > >
> > > From: "Diablo" <diablo99@...>
> > >
> > > Only about 1 week ago that Singnet got problems with Cerfnet. Its not
> the
> > > downloading part its the uploading part. My pings using Singnet to
> Prexus is
> > > 150 average as receiving and 200-400 as uploading. Using Pacnet its
like
> > > 500-700 receiving and 400-1000 uploading. Singnet connected at 50666.
> Pacnet
> > > connected at 45333.
> > >
> > > Maybe Singnet users should email them and request for a fix asap.
> > >
> > > Once the Singnet problem is fixed. I will use Singnet back again
because
> > > Pacnet is really slow (even downloading webpages).
> > >
> > > BTW: For wizs. Attempt to do the Ice Comet Quest as soon as you think
> you
> > > can. The Staff of the Wheel (dmg 10 delay 100 +10 int +10 hp +10 mana
> weight
> > > 1.0 [only!]) is simply a prized weapon when used with glowing stein.
> (total
> > > combo of 20 int and some additional mana) This beats the Staff of the
> > > Observers anytime.
> > >
> > > If any of you would like to ask how I did it, as the Ice Comet Quest
> info
> > > circulating on the net may not be accurate at all, feel free to email
> me.
> > >
> > > Mazy
> > > Level 48 Wizard
> > > Prexus
